channel.title: [HELP] With changing hp bar on client [ HELP ]
channel.description:
Ok on my client it has this hp bar:
[IMG]http://i446.photobucket.com/albums/qq188/ddsspeced/oldhpbar.jpg[/img]
And i want it to have this hp bar:
[IMG]http://i446.photobucket.com/albums/qq188/ddsspeced/newhpbar.jpg[/img]
:\
How would i do it ?
I've searched through all my modles, spirites etc and still cant find anything :(.
Help would be appreciated, [Rep++] for help.

item.title: [HELP] With changing hp bar on client [ HELP ]
item.dc:creator: @Holy-Wings Holy-Wings
item.description:
@Holy-Wings wrote:

Make a sprites folder. Go to 1 of the class documents. look for the sprites location thingo’ if you cant find. create your own. get the image and put in sprites folder. and name it what ever you want.

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] With changing hp bar on client [ HELP ]

item.title: [HELP] With changing hp bar on client [ HELP ]
item.dc:creator: @Quackulon Quackulon
item.description:
@Quackulon wrote:

if you have a renamed client, its Drawgraphics or something, I seen this a few times.

If a non renamed client, i believe you should search for method 366 ( dont kill me if im not right )

Read full topic
